reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major muscular dystrophy subtypes: Duchenne (~3 per 100k), Becker (~1 per 100k), myotonic (~4 per 100k), FSHD (~2 per 100k), LGMD (~1 per 100k), congenital (~1 per 100k). Total ~12 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneity and variation in incidence estimates across regions.
